name: Where The Bloody Hell is Lord Lucan?
name_original: Where The Bloody Hell is Lord Lucan?
description:
Errata: One of the clues in this game is "Old Zealand", which I have later found out can be interpreted in two ways. I will say that when coming up with clues, I wasn't thinking about the Netherlands.

A game made in 3 hours for Trijam #129, with the theme "You have to look for it!"

Lord Lucan is on the run! 

Prime suspect in the murder of Sandra Rivett, you must search the globe to find Lord Lucan and bring him to justice!

But, as with everything that's lost, he may be in the last place you look...

Read the clues and select the right place using your mouse. You get more points based on how quickly you choose the right answer.

Credits

  • vladdeSV: Programming
  • Two Separate Gorillas: Art assets, sounds, gameplay.

Note: Any inaccuracies in the map of Europe in the game are not intended as a geopolitical statement, but rather are errors by the creators.
